Hi guys welcome to Genevieve's playhouse today
we have care bears blind bags collectible figures

3 the pearlized edition. I'm really excited
about this; didn't even know that they had

come out with a new edition. And let's see,
we can get this rare chase care bear hear

called Work of Heart Bear, Friend Bear, Grumpy
Bear, Hopeful heart bear, Wish Bear, Best

Friend bear, bedtime bear, harmony bear, birthday
bear, and cheer bear! So let's go ahead and

open these up and see who we get today. And
our first care bear is Harmony Bear! I really

like the color of this, this is a very pretty
purple with a pearlized sheen to it and Harmony

Bear has a flower on her tummy with five different
color flower petals, she has a cute little

purple nose, a red heart and cute little tail.
Very cute. Alright let's open up our second

one and see which one we get. And we have
another Harmony Bear! So Harmony Bear has

a twin. Again, I really like the color of
these. It's really cool. Alright let's see

who else we get. And it's wish bear! And wish
bear is like a light green teal color. With

this pearlized finish here. It's got the little
heart. She's got a yellow rainbow and a yellow

star, and a cute little green nose. These
are really pretty I really like the pearl

sheen on these. Alright next up we have, uh
oh. Oh, it's Best Friend Bear! Best Friend

bear has a star, a heart, and a rainbow on
her tummy, and she's also a purpely color,

more of a purplely pink color. Very cute.
Alright we have a couple of Blind bags left

and it's Birthday Bear. Birthday bear is a
pretty yellow, almost orange, with a pearlized

sheen just like all the rest of them. She
has a cute little cupcake on her tummy with

a candle. Very cute. Next up we have Cheer
Bear! Cheer Bear is one of my favorites. She's

got the rainbow across her tummy, pink fur.
I really like these. I think I like these

even better than the glitter edition. Alright
guys this is our last one. So let's see which

care bear we get this time and it's another
cheer bear! Very cute. Alright guys, thanks

so much for watching, I really liked this
pearlized edition so we're probably going

to get some more of these guys and see if
we can get some of the Care bears that we

didn't get today. We also have more of the
glitter bear blind bags so we're going to

be opening up those too. Let me know in the
comments section which ones are your favorite.

Cheer Bear is, of course, my favorite, and
I also like Best Friend bear. Alright guys
thanks for watching =)
